column4: Windows was installed, I've completely formatted it, but the MBR seems to be persistent.
for instance, the grub loader on this hard-drive recognizes that that hard-drive still has a MBR that contains windows xp and ubuntu
even though I've inserted a new MBR for windows with Ms-sys and I've attempted to wipe that drive
It's a western digital 250 gig sata drive, I suppose I have a few questions
could it have MBR protection?
yes
I want to wipe the darn thing completely
yes I have
I've formatted in ext2 and 3, fat32, and ntfs
Same error everytime I try and the MBR persists.
